Davey Osborne.action: Finds reverse gear quickly and executes a rapid backing maneuver to create distance from pursuers.

Davey Osborne.action: Attempts to use the phone to warn Kim despite the dangerous situation.

Davey Osborne.action: Continues to drive on the wrong side of the street to evade pursuers and approaches a street sweeper truck with flashing lights.

Davey Osborne.action: Fumbles with the car phone trying to call Kim to warn her about the bomb.

Davey Osborne.action: Fumbles with the car phone trying to dial out immediately after the crash.

Davey Osborne.action: Attempts to contact Kim to warn her about the bomb.

Davey Osborne.action: Dodges through a crowd, grabs a camera case, and darts back into the crowd to evade pursuers.

Davey Osborne.action: Slams through the front door while being pursued, but is eventually caught and shaken by a guard.

Davey Osborne.action: Tries to explain to the Guard that he did not steal but took the wrong camera case.

Davey Osborne.action: Desperately points out that the camera case in the Guard's arms contains secret plans.

Davey Osborne.action: Tries to explain to the guard that the camera case he has contains secret plans, despite being shaken and rattled.

Davey Osborne.action: Mistakenly picks up the wrong camera case, leading to a confrontation with the guard.

Davey Osborne.action: Allows George to take charge of the situation and escort him away while George handles the misunderstanding.

Davey Osborne.action: Desperately points out that the case the guard is holding contains secret plans, showing concern and a sense of responsibility.

Davey Osborne.action: Keeps glancing back anxiously at the men and the case while being led away by Eunice.
Davey Osborne.assessment: His repeated concern and vigilance show he is attentive and cares about the safety of others and the mission, which suggests sincerity and a protective nature.

Davey Osborne.action: Argues with Eunice about the importance of the case and tries to explain the contents to her.

Davey Osborne.action: Turns to Eunice to explain the significance of the case despite her dismissive attitude.

Davey Osborne.action: Shows a broken-hearted expression when holding the camera case, indicating emotional investment.

Davey Osborne.action: Desperately points out that the case the guard is holding contains secret plans, trying to intervene despite being steered away by Eunice.

Davey Osborne.action: Keeps glancing back at the men and the security guard while being led away, showing vigilance.

Davey Osborne.action: Attempts to explain the significance of the contents of the case (the Donkey Kong tape) to Eunice and George.

Davey Osborne.action: Shows emotional distress (almost broken-hearted) when holding the wrong case.

Davey Osborne.action: Flashes George a joyous smile upon finding the tape.

Davey Osborne.action: Shares the tape with Eunice when she asks to see it.

Davey Osborne.action: Expresses concern about the secret plans and the danger posed by the Russian spy.

Davey Osborne.action: Recognizes that the tape case given back is not the one with the secret plans and insists on checking it.

Davey Osborne.action: Explains the situation clearly to George and Eunice, including the involvement of a Russian spy and the detail about the spy missing two fingers.

Davey Osborne.action: Watches Eunice methodically apply perfume with fascination.

Davey Osborne.action: Calls his father urgently to report a bomb threat and imminent theft of plans, trying to get help despite his father's reluctance.

Davey Osborne.action: Davey and Flack tumble out of the phone booth just before the van crashes into it, avoiding injury.

Davey Osborne.action: Davey is involved in a tense situation trying to get to Kim before the bomb.

Davey Osborne.action: Davey and Flack tumble out of the phone booth just before the van crashes into it, avoiding injury.
